# TimedText:Red Velvet - Queendom.ogg.ko.srt

1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:04,840
'Cause we are Queens and Kings 손을 더 높이
2
00:00:04,840 --> 00:00:09,040
모일수록 아름답게 Shining bling bling
3
00:00:09,040 --> 00:00:12,960
비가 내려도 Strong and beautiful
4
00:00:12,960 --> 00:00:16,900
모두 다른 색깔로 완성한 Rainbow
5
00:00:16,900 --> 00:00:18,750
Ladida-do Ba-badida
6
00:00:18,750 --> 00:00:20,600
Ladida-do Ba-badida
7
00:00:20,600 --> 00:00:22,600
다시 한번 시작해볼까
8
00:00:22,600 --> 00:00:24,900
That's our Queendom yeah
9
00:00:24,900 --> 00:00:26,750
Ladida-do Ba-badida
10
00:00:26,750 --> 00:00:28,600
Ladida-do Ba-badida
11
00:00:28,600 --> 00:00:30,000
너와 손을 맞잡은 순간
